Kubernetes Hub

Explore various Kubernetes distributions with their installation scripts and prerequisites. Perfect for development, testing, and production environments.

Minikube

Run a single-node Kubernetes cluster locally for development and testing.

K3s

Lightweight Kubernetes distribution perfect for production workloads at the edge.

MicroK8s

A small, powerful Kubernetes for local testing and development.

KIND

Kubernetes IN Docker - run local Kubernetes clusters using Docker containers.

k0s

Zero friction Kubernetes distribution with minimal resource requirements.

RKE2

Rancher Kubernetes Engine 2 - security focused Kubernetes distribution.

kubeadm

Official Kubernetes cluster bootstrapping tool for production clusters.

k3d

Little helper to run k3s in Docker - perfect for local development.

💡 Click "View Installation" to see prerequisites and installation scripts for each Kubernetes distribution.
